1.panel_description: Display the top 5 vacation spots in Europe.

1.handles: Retrieves a list of top vacation destinations in Europe

input_vars.name: query_vacation_spots
input_vars.description: Query to get the top 5 vacation spots in Europe

output_vars.name: vacation_spots_list
output_vars.description: List of recommended vacation spots in Europe
output_vars.value:
[
      "Rome, Italy: Home to ancient treasures such as the Colosseum and the Vatican.",
      "Prague, Czech Republic: Known for medieval architecture and vibrant cultural scene.",
      "Budapest, Hungary: Offers medieval and baroque architecture and thermal baths.",
      "Dubrovnik, Croatia: Famous for historic city walls and stunning views of the Adriatic Sea.",
      "Berlin, Germany: Known for bold architecture, nightlife, and historical monuments."
    ]

2.panel_description: Display the current weather in the top vacation spots.

1.handles: Fetches latitude and longitude for each vacation spot

input_vars.name: vacation_spots_list
input_vars.description: List of vacation spots from Panel 1
input_vars.value: ["Rome, Italy", "Prague, Czech Republic", "Budapest, Hungary", "Dubrovnik, Croatia", "Berlin, Germany"]

2.handles: Retrieves current weather data for each location

input_vars.name: current_weather_flag
input_vars.description: Flag to include current weather data

output_vars.name: current_weather_data
output_vars.description: Current weather conditions for each vacation spot
output_vars.value:
- Rome: 
      - Temperature: 16.5°C

    - Budapest:

      - Weather Code: 3
    - Dubrovnik:

    - Berlin:

3.panel_description: Display the cheapest flights to the top vacation spots.

1.handles: Retrieves information about the cheapest flights to the vacation spots

input_vars.name: vacation_spots_list
input_vars.description: List of vacation spots from Panel 1
input_vars.value: ["Rome, Italy", "Prague, Czech Republic", "Budapest, Hungary", "Dubrovnik, Croatia", "Berlin, Germany"]

output_vars.name: cheapest_flights_info
output_vars.description: Information about the cheapest flights to the vacation spots
output_vars.value:
- **Rome, Italy**: 
      - Cheapest Months: January ($591) and November ($763)
      - Cheapest Day: Tuesday or Wednesday
      - Cheapest Time of Day: Morning ($643)
      - Cheapest Airport: Rome Ciampino Airport (CIA)
      - Prices: One-way from $134, Round-trip from $361
    - **Prague, Czech Republic**: 
      - Cheapest Month: Off-season (October to March)
      - Cheapest Day: Tuesday or Wednesday
      - Cheapest Time of Day: Morning
      - Prices: One-way under $300 (if booked in advance)
    - **Budapest, Hungary**: 
      - Cheapest Month: Off-season (October to March)
      - Cheapest Day: Tuesday or Wednesday
      - Cheapest Time of Day: Morning
      - Prices: One-way $300-$400, Round-trip $500-$600
    - **Dubrovnik, Croatia to Berlin, Germany**: 
      - Berlin to Dubrovnik: One-way from $25, Round-trip from $71
      - Dubrovnik to Berlin: One-way from $47, Round-trip from $194
      - Airlines: Ryanair, easyJet, Austrian Airlines
    - **General Tips**: 
      - Use flight comparison tools like Momondo, Kayak, Skyscanner
      - Book in advance
      - Sign up for airline newsletters
      - Consider alternative airports for cheaper options
